CustomField.description: Configure the columns of the Lookup popup Fields from the Lookup Object which you'd like to display by populating with the fields APIs from the Lookup Object such as Name__c, additional can be added comma-separated without spaces.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of columns to display for the lookup (the Name field is always displayed). Each column should be the field's API name separated by lines.
CustomField.label: Lookup Display Columns
